column6: BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT! How did things get to be the way they are in the "Time Runs Out" story? Find out here in AVENGERS WORLD! Cannonball and Smasher face their greatest adventure yet...parenthood! Can the new parents survive an encounter with the SHI'AR IMPERIAL GUARD?
column8: | writer:Frank Barbiere | artist:Marco Checchetto | penciller (cover):Jeff Dekal
